attributes.action: Make St George's Day 23rd April a UK Public Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Britons we do not celebrate St George's Day. 17th March St Patrick’s Day has more celebration with parades etc. I think it's time in multi-cultured Britain we need to celebrate St George's day with a public holiday.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
